itunes:title: Emily Ratajkowski on Her Body
title: Emily Ratajkowski on Her Body
description:
Emily Ratajkowski built a career with that bod but is it enough? Beauty is only skin deep but this week Claire and Ashley are tunneling just below the surface through her stack of essays in My Body. 


New merch just dropped!! Shop the celebrity worm, worms don’t rat, and more: https://celebritymemoirbookclub.square.site/


Our comedy show at Nicky’s Unisex is back Thursday, January 6 at 7 pm for live comedy!! RVSP Here


Join the Facebook group to chat with the other worms! https://www.facebook.com/groups/cmbcwormhole


Follow us on Twitter @cmbc_podcast and Instagram @celebritymemoirbookclub 


Art by @adrianne_manpearl and theme song by @ashleesimpsonross


Support the show
